structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Permit required for installation of initial system -- Contents of application and permit -- Exemptions.

text.section: Notwithstanding KRS 198B.030 to the contrary, any person who installs an initial heating, ventilation, or air conditioning system shall apply for a permit prior to beginning the installation. No installation shall begin before the application for the permit has been filed. In no event, however, shall a person exempt under KRS 198B.674 be required to possess or show proof of a heating, ventilation, or air conditioning license in order to obtain the permit required by this section.

The applicant for a heating, ventilation, and air conditioning permit, by the act of applying for the permit, shall be deemed to consent to inspection of the installation by authorized inspectors of the Commonwealth of Kentucky and of the relevant city, county, urban-county, charter county, unified local government, or consolidated local government.

No permit shall be required for any installation performed on a manufactured home as defined by KRS 227.550(7), by a manufactured home retailer licensed pursuant to KRS 227.610, or by a manufacturer as defined by KRS 227.550(9).
No permit or inspection shall be required for the installation of window unit air conditioners or space heaters.
No permit or inspection shall be required for the installation of a heating, ventilation, or air conditioning system except in buildings designed for human occupancy.

law.history: Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 86, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2008.
